title: Legend Of Grimrock 2 (Latest With Patch 2.2.4) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here the latest installer for grimrocks 2. It patched to the latest version which 2.2.4. Hope you enjoy and please help seed.

Release Notes for version 2.2.4 

Ã¢â‚¬â€œ optimized performance of the graphics engine 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ added max draw distance option to grimrock.cfg 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ optimized input latency especially when frame rate drops below 60 fps 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ added touchscreen mode to game options (enables attacking with left mouse button) 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ improved dynamic lighting effects when using low quality rendering mode 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ bug fix: tomb of guardians puzzle could end up in an incorrect state 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ bug fix: projectiles donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t pass through open cemetery gate 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ bug fix: a monster standing in a monster blocker square canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t be melee attacked 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ bug fix: skeleton archers can be poisoned 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ bug fix: projectiles stuck in a fire elemental are lost when the elemental hits the party and explodes 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ bug fix: snakes inside force fields can be hit with projectiles 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ bug fix: knockback can move the party while falling 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ bug fix: spell panel remains open when using bare hands to cast and items are equipped into mageÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s hands 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ bug fix: loot dropped by monsters is sometimes (very rarely) spawned in wrong square

Modding: 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ improved error handling of illegal object references in scripts 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ video *.ivf files are now automatically exported to mods 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ added support for drawing portraits using the gui context 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ added defineCondition function for creating custom conditions 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ added 35 new scripting functions and hooks 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ ItemComponent:setGameEffect() now accepts nil parameter 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ bug fix: FirearmAttackComponent:setBaseDamageStats() has an incorrect argument type 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ bug fix: ProjectileComponent:setCastByChampion() has an incorrect argument type 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ bug fix: MaterialEx:setTexture() does not work for standard textures (diffuseMap, specularMap, normalMap, emissiveMap) 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ bug fix: calling setDoorState() after the level has been loaded does not work 
Ã¢â‚¬â€œ bug fix: TeleporterComponent:getTeleportTarget() and StairComponent:getTeleportTarget() do not support multiple return values
